abstract: Idleness leads to crime! The sternly moralistic tone of this short film illuminates some of the attitudes held in the 1950s towards teenagers and their social activities.
description: Dramatizes the problem of car theft and joy-riding by young teenagers in Australia. Points out to car owners and parents how their carelessness can be partly responsible. Shows safety devices and security checks for car-owners.
